name: 2D color picker
description: Replaces saturation and brightness sliders in the costume editor with a 2D color picker. Hold Shift while dragging the cursor to change the values on a single axis.

name: 60FPS project player mode
description: Alt+Click the green flag to toggle 60FPS.

info.text: Projects will run twice as fast at 60FPS, because they typically run at 30FPS.

name: Capitalized Account Settings
description: Changes "Account settings" in the account menu to "Account Settings".

name: Thumbnails setter
description: Adds a button to the bottom-right of the project page to set the thumbnail of your project to any image (including gifs).

name: Follow topics after posting
description: Automatically follow forum topics you post on.

name: Better emojis
description: Replaces the emojis in comments on the website with improved vector designs.

name: Profile page banner
description: Turns the featured project on any user's profile into a nice-looking banner.

name: HD image uploads
description: Adds a new button above the "upload costume" button that automatically converts uploaded bitmap images into SVG (vector) images to avoid losing quality.

info.text: Avoid using the HD upload button if you plan to edit the image after uploading.

name: Better forum quoter
description: Select text in a forum post and click quote in the bottom right corner to only quote the selected text.

info.text: The BBCode may not be 100% accurate. To get fully accurate quotes, quote as normal and delete any parts that you don't need.

name: Bitmap images copying
description: Allows you to copy a bitmap image from the costume editor into the system clipboard, so that you can paste it in other websites or software.

info.text: "Right click â†’ copy" is not supported. You must press Ctrl+C while a bitmap image is selected.

name: Grab single block with Ctrl key
description: Adds the ability to drag a single block out of the middle of a script (instead of the entire stack attached below it) while holding the Ctrl key.

info.text: On macOS, use the Cmd key instead of the Ctrl key.
If "flip controls" is enabled, grabbing blocks individually will be the default behavior. Hold Ctrl to drag the entire stack.

name: Block count
description: Shows the total number of blocks in a project in the editor menu bar. Previously part of "sprite and script count".

name: Duplicate script with Alt key
description: Quickly duplicate a script by dragging it while holding the Alt key. Hold Ctrl as well to only duplicate a single block instead of the entire stack attached below it.

info.text: On macOS, use the Option key instead of the Alt key and Command key instead of the Control key.

name: Block palette category icons
description: Adds icons inside the colored circles that identify block categories.

name: Block switching
description: Right click on a block to switch it to a related block.

name: Save blocks as image
description: Right click the code area to export blocks as SVG/PNG images.

name: Cat blocks
description: Brings back editor cat hat blocks from April Fools 2020.

info.text: The "watch mouse cursor" setting may impact performance when the editor is open.

name: Clone counter
description: Adds a counter above the stage in the editor which shows the total amount of clones.

name: Cloud games
description: Available when clicking the Scratch Addons icon. Shows you how many Scratchers are currently on multiplayer projects, and their usernames.

info.text: You can add the currently open project or studio by clicking the "Add this project/studio" button on the cloud games tab.

name: Number inputs in color picker
description: Lets you set an exact value (0-100) for each slider in the costume editor color picker by typing in a number.

name: Hex color picker
description: Adds hex code inputs to color pickers.

name: Two-column category menu
description: Splits the block category menu into two columns and moves it to the top of the block palette, like in Scratch 2.0.

name: Line breaks in comments
description: Makes line breaks (pressing Enter) in comments on the website visible instead of converting them to spaces.

info.text: Line breaks are only visible to users with this addon enabled. They will appear as spaces for others.

name: Compact messages
description: Makes Scratch's messages page more compact and easier to read.

name: Confirmations
description: Asks if you're sure when committing actions under your Scratch account, such as sharing projects.

name: Copy link to comment button
description: Adds a "Copy Link" button to all comments on the website, next to the "Report" button.

name: Copy reporter values
description: Adds the option to copy values displayed by variable monitors (from the right click context menu) and block reporter balloons.

name: Ctrl+Click to run scripts
description: Only run scripts on click if also holding the Ctrl key.

info.text: On macOS, use the Cmd key instead of the Ctrl key.

name: Ctrl+Enter to post
description: Automatically posts the comment or forum post on Ctrl+Enter.

info.text: On macOS, you can also use the Cmd key.

name: Front page curator link
description: Makes the username of the front page curator a clickable link to their profile.

name: Customizable block shape
description: Adjust the padding, corner radius, and notch height of blocks.

info.text: Decreasing the padding size is only visible to you, so when your projects are viewed by other users, your scripts may overlap.

name: Customizable block text style
description: Changes the thickness of the text on blocks and optionally adds a text shadow.

name: Customizable code area zoom
description: Choose custom settings for the minimum, maximum, speed, and start size of the zoom of scripts in the code area, and autohide the controls.

name: Customizable profile picture border
description: Allows you to hide or change the outline around profile pictures in project and studio comments.

name: Dango rain on profiles (April Fools Day)
description: Users that include the word "dango" on their "About Me" will have dango emojis raining on the sides of their profile.

info.text: Only Scratch Addons users with this enabled will see the dango rain.

name: Website dark mode and customizable colors
description: Customize colors used by the Scratch website. Multiple dark themes by different authors available. If you don't need dark mode but want to change the default colors you can select the "Scratch's default colors" preset and tweak it.

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: You can now completely customize the appearance of the Scratch website.

name: Data category tweaks
description: Provides tweaks for the Data ("Variables") block category.

name: Debugger
description: Adds a new "debugger" window to the editor. Allows for logging into the "Logs" tab of the debugger window using the "log", "warn" and "error" blocks. The "breakpoint" block will pause the project when executed. All running threads can be viewed in the "Threads" tab of the debugger, and when paused the "Step" button can be used to execute the next block. A graph of frames per second and number of clones can be viewed in the "Performance" tab.

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: New "Threads" and "Performance" tabs in the debugger window.

name: Customizable default costume editor colors
description: Changes the default colors and outline size used by the costume editor.

name: Customizable default project
description: Change the default project from the Scratch Cat to any existing project.

name: Disable auto-save
description: Disables the automatic saving of projects while editing.

info.text: This will disable all types of project autosaving. Make sure to manually save your changes frequently to avoid losing them.

name: Do not shift pasted items
description: Paste copied items at their original position instead of shifted slightly in the costume editor.

info.text: This behavior can also be achieved without this addon by Alt+Clicking the item.

name: Disable sprite wobble in sprite pane
description: Allow scripts, costumes, and sounds to be moved to different sprites without the sprites moving around within the sprite pane.

name: Non-draggable sprites in editor
description: Removes the ability to drag sprites around on the stage in the editor, except those explicitly set as draggable. Hold Shift while dragging a sprite to move it normally.

name: Customizable navigation bar
description: Choose a list of links to be displayed in the navigation bar.

name: File drag and drop
description: Lets you drag images and sounds from your file manager into the sprite pane or costume/sound list. You can also drag text files into lists or "ask and wait" question inputs.

name: Echo effect button
description: Brings back the Echo button in the sound editor.

name: Reverse order of project controls
description: Moves the green flag and stop buttons to the right and the full screen button to the left, like in Scratch 2.0.

name: Colored context menus
description: Makes block right click context menus colorful.

name: Editor comment previews
description: Allows you to preview the contents of comments by hovering over collapsed comments and blocks. You can use this to view comments that are off-screen, identify a loop block from the bottom by its preview, fit many long comments in a small space, and more.

name: Editor dark mode and customizable colors
description: Customize colors used by the project editor. Multiple dark themes by different authors available. If you don't need dark mode but want to change the default colors you can select the "Scratch's default colors" preset and tweak it.

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: You can now customize the color of popup backdrops (the solid-color background behind prompts for actions like naming a new variable) separately.

name: Developer tools
description: Adds new menu options to the editor: copy/paste blocks, better clean up, and more!

name: Extra key options
description: Adds more keys to the "key () pressed?" and "when () key pressed" block dropdowns, such as enter, dot, comma, and more. These keys will work even for users who do not have this addon.

info.text: The "experimental keys" include equals, slash, semicolon and more. They may not work on all operating systems or keyboard layouts.

The "Shift keys" include keys which typically require the Shift key and a number key, like hashtag, exclamation mark and more. These keys only work with the "when () key pressed" block and do not work on all operating systems or keyboard layouts.

name: Messages in editor
description: Displays your message count in the editor menu bar.

name: Block dropdown search
description: Allows you to search the options in block dropdowns.

name: Editor sound effects
description: Plays sound effects when you connect or delete blocks.

name: Display stage on left side
description: Moves the stage to the left side of the editor, like in Scratch 2.0.

info.text: To change the position of buttons above the stage, use the "reverse order of project controls" addon.

name: Running block border
description: Adds a colored highlight to the blocks that are currently being executed in a project.

name: Customizable block colors
description: Edit block colors for each category in the editor.

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: Two new presets have been added, including a preset for the new high-contrast block colors coming to Scratch soon.

name: Unshare button in editor
description: Replaces the "Shared" button next to the project title box with a button to unshare the project.

name: Emoji picker for comments
description: Adds a button to insert emojis to comments on the website.

name: Show exact count
description: Shows the exact count for user and studio info. Uses ScratchDB for forums information.

name: Multiple rows in backpack
description: Arranges the contents of the editor backpack into an expandable two-way grid, similar to the costume library and increases the size of certain thumbnails.

name: Expandable search bar
description: Makes the search bar in the navigation bar wider when it's focused.

name: Faster project loading
description: Fixes a Scratch bug that slows down project loading if the editor is opened from a link.

name: Feature unshared projects
description: Allows you to choose unshared projects after clicking "change featured project" in your profile.

name: Featured Dangos (April Fools 2023)
description: Adds some dango-related projects to the front page.

name: Editor find bar
description: Adds a find bar to find and jump to scripts, costumes and sounds next to the sounds tab. Use Ctrl+Left and Ctrl+Right in the code area to navigate to previous or next visited position after using the find bar.

info.text: This addon was previously part of the "developer tools" addon but has moved here.

name: Better editor comments
description: Makes numerous changes to comments in the Scratch editor: fixes a bug where comments attached to blocks don't save their positions correctly after dragging, prevents block comments from spawning off-screen in large scripts, keeps block comment connections straight, and more.

name: Do not automatically run duplicated blocks
description: Fixes a bug in the Scratch editor, where duplicating a block and attaching it to a script causes the script to run.

name: SVG uploads fix
description: Fixes a bug in the Scratch editor that makes uploaded SVG files created with some image editors, such as Affinity Designer, broken.

name: Sprite folders
description: Adds folders to the sprite pane, as well as costume and sound lists. To create a folder, right click any sprite and click "create folder". Click a folder to open or close it. Right click a sprite to see what folders you can move it to, or alternatively drag and drop it into an open folder. This feature works by adding "[folderName]//" at the beginning of the names for your sprites.

info.text: Users with this feature enabled will be able to see the folders in your project. Anyone else will see sprite lists normally (no folders).

name: Copy code button on forums
description: Adds a "copy code" button above code boxes in forum posts that copies the contents into the clipboard.

name: Quote post number
description: Click the "quote post number" button to include a link to the post in your reply.

name: Live forum post preview
description: Automatically shows a preview when you stop typing while writing or editing a forum post.

name: Customizable quotes and code blocks on forums
description: Shows nicer code and quote blocks on the forums.

name: Forum search
description: Adds a post search bar to the forums. Uses ScratchDB for information.

name: Local timezone on forums
description: Uses your local time zone for displaying post dates and times on the forums.

name: More forum toolbar buttons
description: Adds buttons in the forum editing toolbar to insert BBCode tags, such as [center] or [color].

name: Full areas
description: Shows the full content of areas with limited height, such as user signatures on the forums and What I've been doing on profiles, by making them resizable or scrollable.

name: Enhanced full screen
description: Fixes some undesired effects in the project player's full screen mode, opens it in your browser's full screen mode, and hides the green flag toolbar.

info.text: If you choose to hide the toolbar, remember that you can use the Esc key to exit the project player's full screen mode.

name: Gamepad support
description: Interact with projects using a USB or Bluetooth controller/gamepad.

name: High resolution thumbnails
description: Replaces thumbnails across the website with higher resolution images. Useful for Retina (high pixel density) displays and browsing at greater than 100% zoom.

info.text: If your network's data plan is limited, keep in mind that higher resolution images require more data usage.

name: Hide delete button
description: Hides delete button (trash can icon) from sprites, costumes and sounds. They can still be deleted using the right click context menu.

name: Auto-hiding block palette
description: Hides the block palette unless you're hovering over it. Click the lock icon to lock it in place temporarily. Or use the "category click" mode to show/hide it when you click a block category.

info.text: "Palette area hover" mode only extends the viewing area. If you want to be able to drag blocks into that area without them getting trashed, use one of the other modes.

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: This addon was revised and many bugs were fixed.

name: Hide new variables
description: Do not automatically show monitors for newly created variables or lists.

name: Hide project stats
description: Lets you hide love, favorite, remix, comment, and view counts on project pages, the front page, and My Stuff.

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: The padding between statistics has been fixed, there is now an option to show statistics on your own projects, and the My Stuff page is now supported.

name: Hide signatures on forums
description: Hides signatures in forum posts and adds a "Show signature" button.

name: Hide stage and sprite pane
description: Adds a button next to the "small stage" and "large stage" buttons that hides the stage and the sprite pane, making the code area much larger.

name: Horizontal tabs on My Stuff
description: Moves the My Stuff navigation buttons ("All Projects", "My Studios", "Trash") to the top of the page, instead of keeping them on the left.

name: Forums image uploader
description: Adds a button to directly upload and insert images into forum posts.

name: Infinite scrolling
description: Allow for scrolling on different parts of the site without having to click to "load more".

name: Customizable new sprite position
description: Change the default x/y position of new sprites.

name: More items per row
description: Lets you change the number of items displayed in a single row in a grid of projects, studios, or users.

name: Jump to custom block definition
description: Allows you to jump to a custom block's definition using the middle mouse button or Shift+Click on the block.

info.text: This addon was previously part of the "developer tools" addon but has moved here.

name: Shared/edited dates tooltip
description: Hover over a project's share date for information on when exactly it was shared and last edited.

name: Live featured project
description: Shows an interactive featured project, directly from the user's profile. Based on the implementation in Mega Scratch Userscript.

name: Automatically add extensions
description: Auto-shows music, pen, and other extensions in the block category menu in the editor.

name: Higher character limit in "What I'm Working On"
description: Allows you to type 55 more characters in your profile's "What I'm Working On". Everyone on Scratch will see the extra characters.

name: Better forum post editor buttons
description: Changes the icons for buttons in the forum post editor from pixelated bitmaps to Material icons.

name: Project video recorder
description: Adds a "start recording" button to the editor menu bar that allows you to record the project's stage.

name: Message filters
description: Lets you select filters for types of messages to hide or show on Scratch's messages page.

info.text: This does not change your message count. This simply lets you hide certain types of messages on Scratch's messages page.

name: Insert blocks by name
description: Middle or shift-click the code area, or press Ctrl+Space to bring up a block search window. Type block names (or parts of them) and drag them into the code area to add them to your project. The menu can be navigated with the arrow keys and Enter and supports autocompleting with Tab. To prevent the menu from closing, hold Shift while dragging blocks out of it.

info.text: This addon was previously part of the "developer tools" addon but has moved here.

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: This addon was completely reworked. You can now type inputs and reporters inside other blocks, and autocomplete using the Tab key.

name: More links
description: Makes URLs pointing outside scratch.mit.edu clickable.

name: Mouse position display
description: Displays your mouse x/y position above the stage in the editor.

name: Move costume to top or bottom
description: Adds options to the right click context menu for costumes and sounds to move them to the top or the bottom of the list.

info.text: This addon was previously part of the "developer tools" addon but has moved here.

name: Move sprite to front layer
description: Shift+Click a sprite within the sprite pane to move it to the front (top layer) of the stage.

name: Message count on extension icon
description: Adds the current message count in the Scratch Addons icon.

info.text: You can use Do Not Disturb (right click extension icon â†’ Do not disturb) to temporarily hide the message count.

name: Muted project player mode
description: Ctrl+Click the green flag to mute/unmute the project.

info.text: On macOS, use the Cmd key instead of the Ctrl key.

name: ocular integration
description: Shows ocular statuses and forum post reactions. Uses my-ocular.jeffalo.net to obtain data.

name: Name scripts before placing in backpack
description: Asks you to name scripts after you drag them into the backpack, instead of using the default name "code".

name: Necropost highlighter
description: Highlights topics started much earlier than others on the same page in selected forums, so you don't waste time reading zombie messages or replies to help, question or request topics that were actually asked long ago.

info.text: Sometimes an older topic is kept alive for good reasons, like an ongoing conversation, or the original poster following up their own topic months later. All older topics in selected forums are highlighted, including occasional lingering topics that are not necroposts. (That's why they get highlighted, but not removed.)

name: Do not automatically space overlapping scripts
description: Allows scripts to be moved and modified without causing overlapping scripts to move around.

name: Always show number pad
description: Show Scratch's virtual number pad when editing number fields in blocks on all devices, instead of only touchscreen devices.

info.text: A number pad will show when editing number inputs from blocks such as "move () steps".

name: Old studio layout
description: Reverts the layout of the studio page back to the one used before the studio update or the one previously available as part of the Scratch 2.0 â†’ 3.0 addon.

info.text: This addon doesn't work well on mobile devices and in small windows.
The size of most elements is not changed. If you want to see more projects and curators at once, use the "more items per row" addon.

name: One-click studio invites
description: Accept studio invites directly from Scratch's messages page. An accept button will appear below studio invite messages.

name: Onion skinning
description: Shows transparent overlays of previous or next costumes when editing a costume. Controlled by buttons under the costume editor by the zoom buttons.

name: Opacity slider
description: Adds an opacity slider to the costume editor color picker.

info.text: The opacity slider is disabled when no object is selected, or when in bitmap mode.

name: Paint costume by default
description: Changes the default action of "Choose a Sprite/Costume/Backdrop/Sound" buttons, which open the library by default.

name: Costume editor snapping
description: Snap objects in the costume editor to bounding boxes and vector nodes.

name: Pause button
description: Adds a button to pause the project next to the green flag.

name: Pick colors on stage with eyedropper
description: Allows the eyedropper in the costume editor to also pick colors from the stage.

name: Project progress bar
description: Adds a progress bar for loading and saving projects.

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: The progress bar has had a redesign since v1.30.1.

name: Sprite and script count
description: Shows the number of sprites and scripts a project has next to the Remix button.

name: Project notes tabs
description: Creates tabs on a project page for the "Instructions" section and the "Notes and Credits" section.

name: Redirect to standard forums
description: Redirects you to the standard ("main") forums when you click a link to the mobile forums.

name: Remember collapsed forum categories
description: Categories you collapsed on the forum home page (the list of forums) will stay collapsed when you leave and come back.

name: Remix button in own projects
description: Adds the Remix button to your own projects.

name: Remix tree button
description: Brings back the remix tree button to project pages, next to the Copy Link button.

name: Remove curved stage border
description: Removes the curved border around the stage, allowing you to see the corners.

name: Remove autocomplete from search bar
description: Stops web browsers from autocompleting suggestions in the navigation bar's search bar.

name: Sprite deletion confirmation
description: Asks if you're sure when deleting a sprite inside a project.

name: Rename broadcasts
description: Adds an option to rename broadcast messages in the broadcast blocks' dropdowns.

name: Resizable comment input
description: Makes the comment input box vertically resizable in Scratch 3.0-styled pages.

name: Scratch Messaging
description: Available when clicking the Scratch Addons icon. Provides easy reading and replying to your Scratch messages: groups messages by project, shows full comment text and context, allows direct comment replying.

name: Scratch Notifier
description: Notifications on new Scratch messages. Click the notification to go straight to the message (comment, project, etc.)

info.text: You can use Do Not Disturb (right click extension icon â†’ Do not disturb) to temporarily disable notifications.

name: 3.0 Scratchblocks on forums
description: Enables the new version of scratchblocks on the forums.

info.text: The built-in post preview does not support this addon.

name: Scratch 2.0 â†’ 3.0
description: Makes Scratch 2.0-styled pages look like Scratch 3.0.

name: Profile statistics
description: Shows statistics from ScratchDB on user profiles.

name: Snap scripts to grid
description: Drag a script to automatically align its position to the code area dots.

name: Search bar on My Stuff
description: Allows you to search your projects, studios, and trash on the My Stuff page. Simply start typing anywhere on the page to start a search. You can also use Ctrl+Enter after searching to quickly open the top search result.

info.text: If you have a lot of projects or studios, the search might take a while.

name: Username search
description: Allows you to go to a user's profile when you search their username.

name: Search box in sprite pane
description: Adds a search box to the sprite pane to search for sprites by name.

name: Semicolon glitch
description: Adds the semicolon glitch back to Scratch.

name: Share through My Stuff
description: Share projects through the My Stuff page.

name: BBCode source button
description: Adds a button to the forums that shows the BBCode source of a post.

name: Sound duration display
description: Adds a display to the sound editor that shows the total length and the elapsed time of the sound, or the selection within it.

name: Collapsing sprite properties
description: Hides the sprite properties panel by default, like in Scratch 2.0. Use the info button on the currently selected sprite or double-click a sprite to show the properties panel again. To re-hide it, use the collapse button in the properties panel or double-click a sprite.

name: Browse followers button in studios
description: Adds a button at the top of the "curators" tab in studios you manage, that lists your followers and followed users and lets you invite a shown user with a single click.

name: Studio tools
description: Lets managers easily promote curators to managers or remove anyone from a studio on the "curators" tab, and adds the ability to leave a studio using a button under "Follow Studio".

name: Switch variables between "For all sprites" and "For this sprite only"
description: Adds more options when renaming an existing variable or list: allows changing between "For all sprites" and "For this sprite only" and whether variables are stored in the cloud. Also adds a new option when right clicking a variable/list to quickly change its scope.

name: Block transparency
description: Adjust the transparency for blocks in the editor, with separate options for orphaned blocks (those without a hat block at the top) and blocks that are being dragged.

name: True forums YouTube links
description: Replaces links to the embedded site with real YouTube links.

name: TurboWarp button
description: Adds a button on project pages to play the project in TurboWarp.org, next to the Remix button.

info.text: "Replace player" mode changes the Scratch player to a TurboWarp embed, which doesn't support seeing inside projects.

The "Replace player" mode will send your Scratch username to TurboWarp.org for use in cloud data. TurboWarp has separate cloud data servers, so the cloud variables will be different than the ones on the Scratch player.
If the "Replace player" mode is selected, you can Ctrl+Click (Cmd+Click on macOS) the button to open the project in a new TurboWarp tab.

name: Hide Tutorials button
description: Hides the Tutorials button in the editor menu bar.

name: Show user IDs
description: Adds the user ID next to the username at the top of profile pages.

name: Variable manager
description: Adds a tab next to "sounds" in the editor for easily updating variables and lists.

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: List items can now be inserted without holding the Shift key.

name: Project volume slider
description: Adds a volume slider next to the green flag controls.

name: YouTube full screen
description: Enables the full screen button in Scratch's YouTube video player.

name: Alternating nested block colors
description: Makes blocks of the same category alternate between lighter and darker shades when nested inside each other. This is also known as zebra striping.
